bioAsHtml: Daniela Sfregola is a Software Consultant based in London, UK. She has worked as Java developer before moving towards Scala. She is an active contributor to the Scala Community and a passionate blogger at danielasfregola.com.

acceptedTalks.title: Easy and Efficient Data Validation with Cats

bio:
Daniela Sfregola is a Software Consultant based in London, UK.
She has worked as Java developer before moving towards Scala.
She is an active contributor to the Scala Community and a passionate blogger at danielasfregola.com.
